numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that the graph is horizontal.
2. I notice that the graph has percentages.
3. I wonder why the graph shows players of color and head coaches of color.

7. The graph shows the percentages of head coaches of color.
8. The headline is: The graph shows the percentages of players of color and head coaches of color.
